column4: how would i upgrade my open office? just install it over the old? or remove it first? cuz it says it is depended on by other progs
right but with some deb or what?
but what is the name of the package, is it a .rpm?
yeah, what is the format of this package, is it a .rpm?
what is it that you need out of 2.2 to begin with
I don't know, you are the one itching to get 2.2, I assumed there was some reason?
well, first i wanted to learn how to update something w/o having to uninstall it since it wont let me
iirc open office puts out rpms, that will not work in ubuntu
you always need to uninstall something before you update, even when you upgrade something from the package manager it uninstalls the version before it first
so i should uninstall it via advanced even if it says not to in basic?
you should not uninstall it period, you will not be able to install 2.2 because it isn't the right format and if you uninstall you will break a lot
can u do something for me? can u see if http://cougarmail.ccccd.edu/ lets you connect on your comp--- its saying i cant connect. all it should do is prompt user and password
when i click a link in konversdation it brings me to a file://home/usr page
